project_descr: Minimize the risk of exposure from PCBs to humans and the environment, while promoting Mexico's timely compliance with the Stockholm Convention requierements for PCB management, including convention decommisioning and destruction provisions.

outputs.output_descr: Develop a project document (PRODOC) for the Environmentally Sound Management and Destruction of PCBs in Mexico: Second Phase (GEF PPG Phase)

document_name: SDC-85-2016 Servicios de consultoría para la preparación del documento de proyecto Manejo y destrucción ambientalmente adecuados de bifenilos policlorados en México - 2da fase
project_title: minimize the risk of exposure - 2nd stage
